医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
医学新前沿：COVID-19 课程推动多学科合作研究人员强调了医学领域多学科合作的必要性，特别是在解决传染性疾病、精准医学和数据科学方面，正如从 COVID-19 大流行中学到的那样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-frontiers-in-medicine-COVID-19-lessons-push-for-multiciplin-collaboration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-frontiers-in-medicine-COVID-19-lessons-push-for-multiciplin-collaboration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac91938d-b421-40bc-bd74-68472b412e93 Tue, 28 May 2024 00:08:00 -0400 New frontiers in medicine: COVID-19 lessons push for multidisciplinary collaboration
研究表明高糖摄入量可降低儿童哮喘风险，而脂肪、镁和维生素 D 则可增加该风险研究人员利用孟德尔随机法发现，高糖摄入量可能会降低儿童哮喘风险，而高脂肪、镁和维生素 D 摄入量则会增加儿童哮喘风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Study-links-high-sugar-intake-to-lower-childhood-asthma-risk-while-fat-magnesium-and-vitamin-D-increase- .aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Study-links-high-sugar-intake-to-lower-childhood-asthma-risk-while-fat-magnesium-and-vitamin-D-increase- it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc2c0a67-2ed7-46c1-ba5e-c917a2712148 Mon, 27 May 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Study links high sugar intake to lower childhood asthma risk, while fat, magnesium, and vitamin D increase it
研究发现，维生素 D 水平低与老年人患糖尿病的风险较高有关一项荟萃分析发现，即使在调整了几个混杂因素后，低血清维生素 D 水平也会显着增加老年人患 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Low-vitamin-D-levels-linked-to-higher-diabetes-risk-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Low-vitamin-D-levels-linked-to-higher-diabetes-risk-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8f5b6a8-bfd3-4fc9-a3b5-da8172663bed Mon, 27 May 2024 23:29:00 -0400 Low vitamin D levels linked to higher diabetes risk in older adults, study finds
研究表明西兰花可以降低癌症风险对超过 730,000 人进行的荟萃分析表明，大量食用西兰花与降低癌症患病率有关，但还需要更强有力的研究来证实其化学预防特性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Study-suggests-broccoli-may-reduce-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Study-suggests-broccoli-may-reduce-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f7d9732-cc3c-4aa6-a58b-28175f984830 Mon, 27 May 2024 22:39:00 -0400 Study suggests broccoli may reduce cancer risk
新的抗体疗法在对抗肾移植排斥方面显示出希望抗体介导的排斥反应（AMR）是肾移植失败的最常见原因之一。然而，迄今为止，还没有任何治疗方法被证明可以长期有效地对抗这种并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/New-antibody-therapy-shows-promise-in-combating-kidney-transplant-rejection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/New-antibody-therapy-shows-promise-in-combating-kidney-transplant-rejection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73f19b47-23c0-4d42-a057-6c497239c3df Mon, 27 May 2024 15:05:00 -0400 New antibody therapy shows promise in combating kidney transplant rejection
研究人员发现了可能减缓或阻止阿尔茨海默病进展的新方法西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员在阿尔茨海默病研究中取得了重大突破，发现了一种可能减缓甚至阻止疾病进展的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Researchers-identify-novel-way-to-潜在-slow-down-or-halt-Alzheimere28099s-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Researchers-identify-novel-way-to-潜在-slow-down-or-halt-Alzheimere28099s-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa4e75e7-eb8c-4542-b48e-3f037b717058 Mon, 27 May 2024 12:52:11 -0400 Researchers identify novel way to potentially slow down or halt Alzheimer’s progression
研究人员确定了帮助他人的动机所必需的特定大脑区域我们帮助他人的意愿是由特定的大脑区域决定的，研究人员在一项针对大脑受损患者的研究中确定了该区域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Researchers-pinpoint-specific-brain-region-necessary-for-motivation-to-help-others.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Researchers-pinpoint-specific-brain-region-necessary-for-motivation-to-help-others.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a3e6346-7a35-4f23-9257-185ee8c00b48 Mon, 27 May 2024 12:35:45 -0400 Researchers pinpoint specific brain region necessary for motivation to help others
个性化噬菌体疗法成功治疗动物的抗生素耐药性感染一项新的研究表明，通过个性化噬菌体疗法治疗动物抗生素耐药性感染取得了进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Personalized-phage-therapy-successively-treats-antibiotic-pressive-infections-in-animals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Personalized-phage-therapy-successively-treats-antibiotic-pressive-infections-in-animals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3491e5a-e4f9-41df-96c1-a3c3b1589c27 Mon, 27 May 2024 09:28:00 -0400 Personalized phage therapy successfully treats antibiotic-resistant infections in animals
大阪大学将率先开展世界首个使用 α 射线疗法治疗难治性前列腺癌的临床试验大阪大学的一个研究小组在成功开发出一种新型α射线治疗剂（[At-211] PSMA-5）并在动物模型中证实其疗效后，将启动一项由研究者发起的针对难治性前列腺癌患者的临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Osaka-University-to-pioneer-world-first-clinical-trial-for-refractory-prostate-cancer-with-alpha-ray-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Osaka-University-to-pioneer-world-first-clinical-trial-for-refractory-prostate-cancer-with-alpha-ray-therapy.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=646b151e-770a-4d80-92ed-cdc7fd0d50fd Mon, 27 May 2024 09:18:15 -0400 Osaka University to pioneer world-first clinical trial for refractory prostate cancer with alpha-ray therapy
人工智能可以为孤独的人提供陪伴一位机器人专家表示，在全球范围内普遍存在孤独感的情况下，人工智能（AI）技术可以为孤独的人提供陪伴。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/AI-could-offer-companionship-to-lonely-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/AI-could-offer-companionship-to-lonely-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1cff942-8532-4f62-b517-b34be8c1734c Mon, 27 May 2024 08:58:34 -0400 AI could offer companionship to lonely people
